message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to your work, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects the true value it offers. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is really the lowest I can go. This product is truly one of a kind and will bring you significant value in the long run. I'm confident you'll see a return on this investment quickly. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,500?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet at $17,500. I would like to propose $16,000 as a compromise. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
